content: Hey @Richard Feldman do you have anything public related to the TS platform you've been experimenting for Vendr? :)

not yet - I'm currently working on getting https://github.com/roc-lang/roc/tree/main/examples/typescript-interop/node integrated into Vendr's build/deploy process; after that, I'll be looking for a more substantial integration project, and as part of that I'll presumably end up expanding the TS interop in that example to have an eventually comprehensive set of TS glue
